column2: Please see FANTOM5 Protocols for more information.

In the source data file, mm9.cage_peak_phase1and2combined_tpm_ann.osc.txt, transcripts were mapped to genes using Ensembl 80/GENCODE 23 (GRCh38). A median of all expressions reported for a gene/sample in the original file is taken as the the expression for that gene/sample.
